summary: Implemented comprehensive improvements to Beauty Booking module Customer API controllers. Fixed pagination format to use offset/limit (React-compatible), standardized response format across all controllers using BeautyApiResponse trait, improved file upload handling in BeautyReviewController for FormData, enhanced error handling with proper logging, added complete PHPDoc documentation with examples, optimized caching strategy with proper config keys, added eager loading to prevent N+1 queries, and verified security measures. All 9 Customer API controllers updated with consistent patterns and React frontend compatibility.
current_status: All API improvements completed. Beauty Booking module Customer API controllers now have consistent pagination (offset/limit), standardized response format, improved error handling, complete documentation, optimized caching, eager loading, and verified security. All changes are compatible with React frontend expectations. No linter errors. Ready for testing with React frontend.
